item.title: How to Install Docker Desktop on Debian
item.description: Docker is a powerful platform that allows you to develop, ship, and run applications inside containers. Installing Docker on Debian is a straightforward process, and in this guide, we’ll walk you through the steps to get Docker Desktop up and running on your Debian-based system. Prerequisites Before we begin, make sure you have the following prerequisites in place: A Debian-based system (such as Debian itself or Ubuntu) Administrative (sudo) privileges
